descriptions: Added Live Garbage Collection: Unused image files (.png/.txt) are now instantly deleted from the server to save disk space.
Added safeguards to the removal tool: You can now cancel the graffiti removal mode by pressing ESC, Right-click, or typing /graffitiremove again.
Major performance boost: Optimized the rendering logic, keeping client resource usage at a flat ~0.00ms even with many graffitis around.
Fixed a startup bug causing the 'LoadData() nil' error when a player spawns.
Fixed an issue where the automatic washing system would sometimes fail to remove graffitis.
Improved input responsiveness when entering the graffiti placement mode.
Updated translations for multiple languages to include the new cancel actions.
